short_description: [REAL WORKING CALCULATOR & STEM LEARNING] Unlike dummy toys with stickers, this cash register features a fully functional built-in calculator. It turns playtime into a fun math lesson, helping little shopkeepers learn counting, addition, and subtraction while handling play money. Perfect for introducing basic STEM concepts and financial literacy to preschoolers.

[IMMERSIVE CHECKOUT EXPERIENCE] Bring the supermarket to life with realistic features! The conveyor belt transports goods. A notification sound will play upon successful scanning. The microphone amplifies the salesperson's voice. Pressing the "Open" button will pop out the cash register drawer. Includes a swipe card reader for a complete, modern shopping simulation that keeps kids engaged for hours.

[DELUXE 49-PIECE GROCERY SET] Comes with everything needed to open for business immediately. Includes 1 functional register, 1 shopping basket, 22 lifelike grocery items (vegetables, snacks, drinks, seasonings and more), and a 25-piece money set (coins, cash, credit card). The large variety of accessories encourages creative organization and prolonged play sessions.

[SOCIAL PLAY & SKILL DEVELOPMENT] Designed for interactive role-play. Whether playing with parents or friends, children develop crucial social skills, language expression, and hand-eye coordination as they switch roles between customer and cashier. It’s an excellent tool for building confidence and cooperation in a shared environment.

[PREMIUM QUALITY & CHILD-SAFE DESIGN] Made from durable, non-toxic ABS material with smooth, rounded edges to ensure safety for little hands. The sturdy construction withstands rough play. Packaged in a colorful, gift-ready box, making it the ideal birthday, Christmas, or holiday present for boys and girls ages 3 and up.
